trans-unit.source: "Whatever Yawgmoth marks, dies. There is no escape."\n—Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general
trans-unit.target: 「约格莫夫所指者死，无一幸免。」 ～非瑞克西亚将军萨保突瓦克

trans-unit.source: Blightsoil Druid
trans-unit.target: 瘠壤德鲁伊

trans-unit.resname: EMA·80 | Blightsoil Druid | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}，支付1点生命：加{G}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: "See the beauty in death: the clean white bones lying in the fertile soil and the brightly colored moonglove sprouting from the fell earth."
trans-unit.target: 「瞧瞧死亡之美：洁白的骨头躺在肥沃土壤上，月地黄鲜艳的花朵从底下的土地长出来。」

trans-unit.source: Blood Artist
trans-unit.target: 鲜血画家

trans-unit.resname: EMA·81 | Blood Artist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个生物死去时，目标牌手失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Great art can never be created without great suffering."
trans-unit.target: 「未经深刻的苦痛，便无深刻的艺术。」

trans-unit.resname: EMA·82 | Braids, Cabal Minion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Braids, Cabal Minion
trans-unit.target: 柯帮干部布蕾德

trans-unit.resname: EMA·82 | Braids, Cabal Minion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices an artifact, creature, or land.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的维持开始时，该牌手牺牲一个神器，生物或地。

trans-unit.resname: EMA·82 | Braids, Cabal Minion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Home is where you can find a decent graveyard and strangers can disappear without awkward questions."
trans-unit.target: 「家园，是指可以找到像样的墓场，且陌生人无故消失也不会有人问东问西的地方。」

trans-unit.source: Cabal Therapy
trans-unit.target: 柯帮疗法

trans-unit.resname: EMA·83 | Cabal Therapy | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Name a nonland card. Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all cards with that name.\nFlashback—\nSacrifice a creature. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 说出一个非地牌的名称。目标牌手展示其手牌，并弃掉所有具该名称的牌。 返照～牺牲一个生物。（你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.source: Carrion Feeder
trans-unit.target: 腐食怪

trans-unit.resname: EMA·84 | Carrion Feeder | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't block.\nSacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能进行阻挡。 牺牲一个生物：在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Stinking of rot, it leaps between gravestones in search of its next meal.
trans-unit.target: 它带着腐败气息在墓碑间跳跃，寻找着下一餐。

trans-unit.source: Deadbridge Shaman
trans-unit.target: 亡桥祭师

trans-unit.resname: EMA·85 | Deadbridge Shaman | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, target opponent discards a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，目标对手弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Ending her life won't end the infestation.
trans-unit.target: 终结她的生命并不会终止感染。

trans-unit.source: Duress
trans-unit.target: 逼从

trans-unit.source: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
trans-unit.target: 目标对手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张非生物且非地的牌。该牌手弃掉该牌。

trans-unit.source: "Don't worry. I'm not going to deprive you of all your secrets. Just your most precious one."\n—Liliana Vess
trans-unit.target: 「放心。我不会把你所有的秘密都夺走。我只拿最珍贵的那个。」 ～莉莲娜维斯

trans-unit.source: Entomb
trans-unit.target: 入土

trans-unit.source: Search your library for a card and put that card into your graveyard. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张牌，并将该牌置入你的坟墓场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "I'll return once you've ripened."\n—Ghoulcaller Gisa
trans-unit.target: 「等你熟透了我再回来。」 ～尸鬼牧者基沙

trans-unit.source: Eyeblight's Ending
trans-unit.target: 碍眼末日

trans-unit.resname: EMA·88 | Eyeblight's Ending | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target non-Elf creature.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标非妖精的生物。

trans-unit.source: "Those without beauty are Lorwyn's greatest tumor. The winnowers have an unpleasant duty, but a necessary one."\n—Eidren, perfect of Lys Alana
trans-unit.target: 「不具美感的东西是洛温最大毒瘤。筛除者的职责不讨好，但的确必要。」 ～黎撒拉那至美艾简

trans-unit.source: Gravedigger
trans-unit.target: 掘墓怪

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: A full coffin is like a full coffer—both are attractive to thieves.
trans-unit.target: 满载的棺木就像满载的宝库～两者都对贼有吸引力。

trans-unit.source: Havoc Demon
trans-unit.target: 劫难恶魔

trans-unit.resname: EMA·90 | Havoc Demon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME dies, all creatures get -5/-5 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME死去时，所有生物得-5/-5直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: A cry of pain as it enters this world. A chorus of screams as it leaves.
trans-unit.target: 降临时一声惨叫；离去时一片哭嚎。

trans-unit.resname: EMA·91 | Honden of Night's Reach | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Honden of Night's Reach
trans-unit.target: 夜幕本殿

trans-unit.resname: EMA·91 | Honden of Night's Reach | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent discards a card for each Shrine you control.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你每操控一个祭祠，目标对手便弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: EMA·91 | Honden of Night's Reach | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: To the sorrow of all, its dark reach grasped and crushed those who guarded its silent vigil.
trans-unit.target: 最令人哀痛的，是其夜幕竟转而攫杀过往的卫众。

trans-unit.resname: EMA·92 | Hymn to Tourach | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hymn to Tourach
trans-unit.target: 妥拉克赞歌

trans-unit.resname: EMA·92 | Hymn to Tourach | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player discards two cards at random.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手随机弃两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: EMA·92 | Hymn to Tourach | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The priests plead for your anguish and pray for your despair.
trans-unit.target: 僧侣盼你受苦，愿你绝望。

trans-unit.source: Ichorid
trans-unit.target: 灵液妖

trans-unit.source: Haste\nAt the beginning of the end step, sacrifice CARDNAME.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, if CARDNAME is in your graveyard, you may exile a black creature card other than CARDNAME from your graveyard. If you do, return CARDNAME to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 在结束步骤开始时，牺牲CARDNAME。 在你的维持开始时，若CARDNAME在你的坟墓场中，则你可以将一张CARDNAME以外的黑色生物牌从你的坟墓场放逐。若你如此作，则将CARDNAME移回战场。

trans-unit.source: Innocent Blood
trans-unit.target: 无辜之血

trans-unit.resname: EMA·94 | Innocent Blood | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player sacrifices a creature.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手各牺牲一个生物。

trans-unit.source: Zombies mourn for the living and celebrate those who will soon be given the gift of death.
trans-unit.target: 灵俑为生者悲叹，却为喜获死亡的人庆贺。

trans-unit.resname: EMA·95 | Lys Alana Scarblade | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lys Alana Scarblade
trans-unit.target: 黎撒拉那划疤客

trans-unit.resname: EMA·95 | Lys Alana Scarblade | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Discard an Elf card: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves you control.
trans-unit.target: {T}，弃一张妖精牌：目标生物得-X/-X直到回合结束，X为由你操控的妖精数量。

trans-unit.resname: EMA·95 | Lys Alana Scarblade | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In beauty-obsessed Lys Alana, one cut of her blade means the difference between a high society feast and raking through the dungheap for scraps.
trans-unit.target: 在为美着迷的黎撒拉那，其刀锋一划区分了上流盛宴与粪堆觅食。

trans-unit.source: Malicious Affliction

trans-unit.target: 丧心～当你施放CARDNAME时，若本回合有生物死去，则你可以复制CARDNAME，且可以为该复制品选择新的目标。 消灭目标非黑色的生物。

trans-unit.source: "Such an affliction appears to seek out the pure."\n—Byro, plague doctor
trans-unit.target: 「此类折磨之目的似乎是找出至纯生灵。」 ～瘟疫医士拜洛

trans-unit.source: Nausea

trans-unit.source: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 所有生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Was it something I said?"
trans-unit.target: 「是因为我说了什么吗？」

trans-unit.source: Necropotence
trans-unit.target: 死冥权能

trans-unit.source: Skip your draw step.\nWhenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.\nPay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.
trans-unit.target: 略过你的抓牌步骤。 每当你弃一张牌时，将该牌从你的坟墓场放逐。 支付1点生命：牌面朝下地放逐你的牌库顶牌。在你的下一个结束步骤开始时，将该牌置于你手上。

trans-unit.source: Nekrataal
trans-unit.target: 尼可拉塔

trans-unit.source: First strike\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. That creature can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 先攻 当CARDNAME进战场时，消灭目标非神器且非黑色的生物。该生物不能重生。

trans-unit.source: His victims don't have time to feel despair.
trans-unit.target: 其下手目标连感到绝望的时间都没有。

trans-unit.source: Night's Whisper
trans-unit.target: 夜空细语

trans-unit.source: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 你抓两张牌且失去2点生命。

trans-unit.source: "I have seen things that would reduce a weaker person to blubbering and raving. Want to hear about them?"\n—Vraska
trans-unit.target: 「我见识过让弱者哭泣胡言之物。想认识看看吗？」 ～瓦丝卡

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Gargantua
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚巨罡兽

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你抓两张牌且失去2点生命。

trans-unit.source: Other Phyrexians have nightmares about the gargantua.
trans-unit.target: 其他的非瑞克西亚人，都曾在恶梦中见过这巨兽。

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Rager
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚狂怒兽

trans-unit.resname: EMA·102 | Phyrexian Rager | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你抓一张牌且失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "I believe many worlds will bow to Phyrexia. Mirrodin is merely the first."\n—Sheoldred, Whispering One
trans-unit.target: 「我相信许多世界都将臣服于非瑞克西亚。秘罗地只不过是第一个。」 ～细语者希欧蕊

trans-unit.source: Plague Witch
trans-unit.target: 疫病巫师

trans-unit.resname: EMA·103 | Plague Witch | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {B}，{T}，弃一张牌：目标生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "I can ail what cures you."
trans-unit.target: 「我可以把你的良药变成病源。」

trans-unit.source: Prowling Pangolin
trans-unit.target: 潜行穿山甲

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, any player may sacrifice two creatures. If a player does, sacrifice CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，任意牌手可以牺牲两个生物。若有牌手如此做，牺牲CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: "Wait, are *we* the decoys?"
trans-unit.target: 「等等，难道我们就是诱饵？」

trans-unit.source: Sengir Autocrat
trans-unit.target: 辛格氏独裁者

trans-unit.resname: EMA·105 | Sengir Autocrat | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, put three 0/1 black Serf creature tokens onto the battlefield.\nWhen CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, exile all Serf tokens.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，将三个0/1黑色农奴衍生生物放进战场。 当CARDNAME离开战场时，放逐所有农奴衍生物。

trans-unit.source: "The penalty for idleness is death. The penalty for disputing the penalty is death."
trans-unit.target: 「偷懒者死。质疑此罪者同罪。」

trans-unit.source: Sinkhole
trans-unit.target: 地陷

trans-unit.source: Destroy target land.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标地。

trans-unit.source: High walls, a sturdy keep, a strong garrison . . . they made no difference. In a matter of moments, the city was lost.
trans-unit.target: 墙垣高耸，要塞坚固，驻防强韧，但尽皆徒然。此城只消片刻就陷落了。

trans-unit.source: Skulking Ghost
trans-unit.target: 隐匿鬼魂

trans-unit.resname: EMA·107 | Skulking Ghost | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME成为咒语或异能的目标时，将它牺牲。

trans-unit.source: "They exist only so long as the living take no notice."\n—Kifimbo, Shadow guildmage
trans-unit.target: 「它们的存在止于生灵注意之时。」 ～黯影公会法师基芬博

trans-unit.source: Toxic Deluge
trans-unit.target: 毒雨倾盆

trans-unit.resname: EMA·108 | Toxic Deluge | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast CARDNAME, pay X life.\nAll creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 支付X点生命，以作为施放CARDNAME的额外费用。 所有生物得-X/-X直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "It's a difficult task to quarantine a plague that moves with the clouds."\n—Esara, healer adept
trans-unit.target: 「隔离随云漂移的瘟疫是至难之业。」 ～治疗专家易萨拉

trans-unit.source: Tragic Slip
trans-unit.target: 悲剧失足

trans-unit.resname: EMA·109 | Tragic Slip | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.\nMorbid — That creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead if a creature died this turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。 丧心～如果本回合有生物死去，则改为该生物得-13/-13直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Linger on death's door and risk being invited in.
trans-unit.target: 若徘徊于死亡门口，小心会给请进去。

trans-unit.source: Twisted Abomination
trans-unit.target: 曲恶憎恨兽

trans-unit.resname: EMA·110 | Twisted Abomination | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {B}: Regenerate CARDNAME.\nSwampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)
trans-unit.target: {B}：重生CARDNAME。 循环沼泽{2}（{2}，弃掉此牌：从你的牌库中搜寻一张沼泽牌，展示该牌，并置于你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。）

trans-unit.source: Urborg Uprising
trans-unit.target: 乌尔博格式起义

trans-unit.resname: EMA·111 | Urborg Uprising | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 将至多两张目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: In Urborg, few things are less permanent than death.
trans-unit.target: 在乌尔博格，很少有比死亡更不恒久的。

trans-unit.source: Vampiric Tutor
trans-unit.target: 吸血鬼导师

trans-unit.resname: EMA·112 | Vampiric Tutor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张牌，然后将你的牌库洗牌，并将该牌置于其上。你失去2点生命。

trans-unit.source: True power is achieved through blood and sweat. But mostly blood.
trans-unit.target: 要流血流汗来换得真正力量。不过主要是血。

trans-unit.source: Victimize
trans-unit.target: 生体活祭

trans-unit.source: Choose two target creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice a creature. If you do, return the chosen cards to the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 选择两张目标在你坟墓场中的生物牌。牺牲一个生物。如果你如此作，则将所选择的牌横置移回战场。

trans-unit.source: "Die. But die knowing that your pathetic life will yield a great bounty for me."\n—Zul Ashur, lich lord
trans-unit.target: 「去死吧。知道你这悲惨的一生能为我换回莫大回报，你也死得明白。」 ～巫妖领主祝亚许

trans-unit.resname: EMA·114 | Visara the Dreadful | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Visara the Dreadful
trans-unit.target: 颤栗薇刹拉

trans-unit.resname: EMA·114 | Visara the Dreadful | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {T}：消灭目标生物。它不能重生。

trans-unit.resname: EMA·114 | Visara the Dreadful | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "My eyes are my strongest feature."
trans-unit.target: 「眼睛是我的最大特点。」

trans-unit.resname: EMA·115 | Wake of Vultures | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wake of Vultures
trans-unit.target: 警醒的秃鹰

trans-unit.resname: EMA·115 | Wake of Vultures | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {1}{B}，牺牲一个生物：重生CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: EMA·115 | Wake of Vultures | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "So the vulture said to the griffin, 'You gonna eat that?'"\n—Azeworai, "The Ugly Bird"
trans-unit.target: 「于是秃鹰就对狮鹫说：『你真要吃那玩意儿？』」 ～阿札渥雷，《丑陋的鸟》

trans-unit.source: Wakedancer
trans-unit.target: 醒夜舞者

trans-unit.source: Morbid — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 丧心～当CARDNAME进战场时，若本回合有生物死去，将一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物放进战场。

trans-unit.source: Hers is an ancient form of necromancy, steeped in shamanic trance and ritual that few skaberen or ghoulcallers comprehend.
trans-unit.target: 她运用死灵术的古老形式，其间的祭师出神与仪式超出多数尸嵌家或尸鬼牧者的理解能力。

trans-unit.source: Avarax
trans-unit.target: 阿帕垒兽

trans-unit.source: Haste\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card named CARDNAME, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.\n{1}{R}: CARDNAME gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张名称为CARDNAME的牌，展示该牌，并将它置于你手上。若你如此作，则将你的牌库洗牌。 {1}{R}：CARDNAME得+1/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Battle Squadron
trans-unit.target: 战斗航空队

trans-unit.resname: EMA·118 | Battle Squadron | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nCARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于由你操控的生物数量。

trans-unit.source: The goblins made an unruly pile with military precision.
trans-unit.target: 鬼怪们依军事用途造出一团乱七八糟的东西。

trans-unit.source: Whether trained, ridden, or eaten, few goblin military innovations have rivaled the bug.
trans-unit.target: 不论是从训练、骑乘还是风味来说，甲虫都堪称鬼怪军事创新一绝。

trans-unit.source: Borderland Marauder

trans-unit.source: Though she is rightly feared, there are relatively few tales of her deeds in battle, for few survive her raids.
trans-unit.target: 虽然她确实令人畏惧，但其战斗事迹却鲜有流传，因为没人能活过她的突袭。

trans-unit.source: Burning Vengeance

trans-unit.source: Mist is the geists' sorrow. Wind is their pain. Fire is their vengeance.
trans-unit.target: 雾是游魂的悲伤。风是其痛苦。火是其复仇。

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to target creature or player. That creature can't be regenerated this turn. If the creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物或牌手造成3点伤害。然后该牌手或该生物的操控者可以支付{R}{R}。如果该牌手如此作，则他可以复制此咒语，且可以为该复制品选择新的目标。
